title: Liking You
alternative_title: L'Amour à la carte ; Ren'ai à la carte! ; Renai à la Carte ; Secret Desire Under the Uniform
status: L'Amour à la carte ; Ren'ai à la carte! ; Renai à la Carte ; Secret Desire Under the Uniform
description:
Description :
        The story revolves around the relationships between the members of an all-male college photography club. Chapter 1-4, 7: * First Side * Second Side * Last Side * Other Side * Conscious ~ Mix Version Isumi’s photography club has started its summer workshop! Little did he know that the cool and handsome Shinooka would declare his love and the photography addict-Okutsura-would harass him…Under such circumustances, can he get out alive? Chapter 5: Conscious ~ Side Story Chapter 6: Hidden Desires Within An Uniform

chapters.chapter_name: Vol.1 Chapter 6 : Hidden Desires Within An Uniform
